author: ekmcmahon
post: I’m sorry/not sorry but when I was first convinced of the reality of the Shroud I did not see coins covering the eyes. All I can do now is when I kind of stare at the Shroud of Turin picture , I ask myself “are there coins there ?”, to me it is just not a coins over eyes image. I’m not saying they are not there, I just don’t see them..
title: The Sudarium of Oviedo as Evidence?
